title: unesco_heritage_Historic_Centre_of_Sighişoara
text:
Name: Historic Centre of Sighişoara. short_description:

Founded by German craftsmen and merchants known as the Saxons of Transylvania, Sighişoara is a fine example of a small, fortified medieval town which played an important strategic and commercial role on the fringes of central Europe for several centuries.

. date_inscribed: 1999. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 24.79222222. latitude: 46.21777778. area_hectares: 33. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Romania. Region: Europe and North America. iso_code: ro. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
